text: Julie Taymor (born December 15, 1952) is an American director of Broadway theatre and movies. Taymor's work has received lots of praise from critics. She has won two Tony Awards out of four nominations, an Emmy Award, and an Academy Award nomination for her work, known for its visual flair and colorful costuming choices. She lives in New York City with her partner Elliot Goldenthal, who she has been with for over 20 years. ==Filmography== *The Tempest (1986) *Fool's Fire (1992) (TV) *Oedipus Rex (1993) (TV) *Titus (1999) *Frida (2002) *Across the Universe (2007) Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:American movie directors Category:Emmy Award winners Category:Tony Award winners Category:People from Massachusetts
title: Julie Taymor
